name: Dark-Light
components: V, S, M/DF (a pinch of Darklands earth)
text: You evoke a powerful light that affects all sighted creatures that do not posses light sensitivity. Those that succeed on their saves are dazzled for 1 round per level; those who fail are blinded for the same duration.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料/法器 (一搓幽暗地域的泥土)
target_zh: 没有光线敏感(light sensitivity)的生物
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则部分生效; 见文本
text_zh: 你激起强大的光芒，影响所有没有光线敏感，能够看见的生物。那些在豁免检定中成功的生物目眩1轮/等级，而在豁免检定失败的目盲1轮/等级。
